title: World of Goo 2 launches in May on the Epic Store - but Linux support from their website
description: World of Goo 2 was quite a surprise reveal late last year and now it actually has a released date, although it won't be on Steam.

title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree trailer up - releasing June 21st
description: ELDEN RING continues to be one of the most played games on Steam Deck (and it works great on Desktop Linux) and now what many have been waiting for - ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree has a trailer and release date.

title: There's no end to Vampire Survivor-likes with Temtem: Swarm announced
description: Remember the days when every developer seemed to be announcing some kind of Battle Royale game or mode for an existing game? Well now it's very much Vampire Survivor-likes. Even the monster catching Temtem is being turned into one with Temtem: Swarm.

title: Steam users redeemed over $80 million in physical wallet cards in December 2023
description: Valve continues to pretty much print money, and they've released their latest yearly review and 2023 seems to be another great year for Steam.

title: Enjoyed Unpacking? Check out Furnish Master to design apartments, houses & more
description: If you enjoyed Unpacking and want perhaps a little something more to design the entire room and then some, Furnish Master looks like one you may want to try.

title: System76 are giving their Linux laptops a big refresh
description: System76 makers of Pop!_OS, various laptops and the stylish Thelio desktop line have announced a big refresh for their line of laptops.

title: Halls of Torment the retro Diablo styled Vampire Survivors-like 'closing in on the finale'
description: Developer studio Chasing Carrots say they're "closing in on the finale" for the fantastic Halls of Torment, which blends a classic Diablo style with Vampire Survivors-like gameplay for a great mix.
